title: Moroccan Lamb and Vegetables with Couscous
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons oil', '1kg lamb shoulder, cut into large cubes', '3 onions, minced', '25g fresh coriander, chopped', '6 tomatoes, peeled and chopped', '3 tablespoons passata', '1 pinch nutmeg', '1 tablespoon paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 leeks, sliced', '4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '5 carrots, peeled and cut into thick slices', '3 courgettes, peeled and cut into thick slices', '450g chickpeas', '1kg couscous', '160g butter, softened']
